description:
### 11.176 noformat

Force libavfilter not to use any of the specified pixel formats for the input
to the next filter.

It accepts the following parameters:

**pix_fmts**

    A ’|’-separated list of pixel format names, such as pix_fmts=yuv420p|monow|rgb24".
name: noformat

options.description: A ’|’-separated list of pixel format names, such as pix_fmts=yuv420p|monow|rgb24".
options.name: pix_fmts
